snippet: State Senator Malcolm A. Smith wanted to be mayor and thought he had a way to win, an undercover agent says.
abstract: Undercover Federal Bureau of Investigation agent, testifying in bribery and wire fraud trial of New York State Sen Malcolm A Smith, describes Smith's plan to get himself on the New York City ballot as Republican in 2013 mayoral race.
lead_paragraph: State Senator Malcolm A. Smith wanted to be mayor and thought he had a way to win, an undercover agent says.

headline.main: In Fraud Trial, F.B.I. Agent Testifies That Senator Funneled Money to Lawmakers
headline.print_headline: In Fraud Trial, F.B.I. Agent Testifies That Senator Funneled Money to Lawmakers
